help_shortcut_content_p1.message: In Firefox, shortcuts are managed through the Add-ons page:

help_shortcut_content_li1.message: Navigate to **about:addons** in your address bar.

help_shortcut_content_li2.message: Click the **gear icon (⚙️)** in the top-right corner.

help_shortcut_content_li3.message: Select **Manage Extension Shortcuts** from the menu.

help_shortcut_content_li4.message: Find **Translate It** and set your desired shortcut.

help_api_keys_title.message: Where do I get API keys?

help_api_keys_content.message: You can find links to each API provider's website in the **API** tab. You will need to create an account on their respective platforms to generate a key.

help_shortcut_content_chrome_li3.message: Click the pencil icon (✏️) next to **Translate It** and type your new shortcut.

extension_enabled_description.message: Enable or disable the entire extension functionality except Popup.

translate_on_text_fields_label.message: Showing translation Icon on text fields

translate_on_text_fields_description.message: Quick access to translation via icon directly within input/textarea fields.

enable_shortcut_for_text_fields_label.message: Enable Ctrl+/ shortcut for text fields

enable_shortcut_for_text_fields_descript.message: Allow using the Ctrl+/ keyboard shortcut to trigger translation when inside a text field. (alternative: Ctrl+Alt+/)

translate_with_select_element_descriptio.message: Allow triggering translation using a specific selection method (if implemented, e.g., selecting a whole paragraph).

translate_on_text_selection_description.message: Allow triggering translation automatically or via an icon after selecting text on the page.

options_selection_mode_onclick.message: Show icon to translate on click

require_ctrl_for_text_selection_label.message: Require Ctrl key for text selection translation

require_ctrl_for_text_selection_descript.message: When text selection translation is enabled, require holding Ctrl key during selection to trigger translation.

enable_dictionary_translation_descriptio.message: When text selection translation is enabled, single words or short phrases will be treated as dictionary lookups, providing detailed definitions instead of standard translations.
